page.title: 10Aberdeen Airport (continued)
page.content: Following this expansion a new Terminal Building was opened in June 1977, with a new access road from the A96 (Inverness-Aberdeen), bringing it within 15 minutes of the City centre. At the terminal there is a Taxi Rank, a direct Coach Service and also Car Hire facilities are available. Other facilities include an Information Desk, Bank, Duty-free Shop Cafe & Restaurant, Nursery facilities, Post Box, Police, Telephones, Toilets, Photo Booths and a Video and Amusement Arcade. Keeping up with the ever-increasing demands of the Oil Industry is a constant problem facing the owners and operators, the British Airports Authority.
